item.description:
Back Tonight! GROOVE AUTHORITY @ Palmer's


WHEN: Saturday, March 22

WHERE:Palmer's Tavern
TIME: 8pm
music begins @ 9:00
NO COVER CHARGE


Groove Authority = guaranteed fun!
Details
Tonight GROOVE AUTHORITY is back @ Palmer's Tavern. This is an excellent band we have enjoyed and wished they played locally more often! Nice dance music.

Palmer's has been voted 'Best Bar' several times. It's easy to see why! Great drinks reasonably priced, excellent food, entertainment. and a nice crowd of people. Palmer's is ALWAYS packed! We have joked and said it should at time be called "The Elbow Room!"
Dress light.... it does get warm!!

* NOTE: I know Andover is quite a distance from the Worcester area. I have added this to the calendar in the event anyone would be interested in joining us.
I hope to see you there!
_Jo
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup Table Sign on our table(s)
item.why:
This is a joint event with other meetup groups!
GROOVE AUTHORITY = GUARANTEED FUN!
item.name: BACK TONIGHT! Groove Authority
